page.title: 09Employment
page.content:
Sample.Based on the employments of the parents of the older children at Dr South's School.
Fathers-4 work for British Leyland,3 are engineers,2 Civil Servants,1 Farmer,1 Farm Hand,1 Business Executive,1 Insurance Broker,1 computer Operations Manager. Mothers-5 Housewives,2 Home Helps, 5 Stores Shops and Secretarial, 1 Radiographer,1 Teacher. In addition to this there are known to be at least 7 Solicitors in Islip. There are 8 Farms in the area growing cereals.In addition one keeps pigs in a "battery",and also some sheep,and one has a dairy herd.These farms are not labour intensive.There is very little unemployment in the area.The working population of the area is largely made up of commuters.
